p: Starting from grains such as rice and corn, crop harvest [ 72] and weed removal [ 73] can be easily performed by agriculture robots with imaging capabilities. Thermal imaging can be conducted to evaluate water stress in crops for irrigation control [ 97]. Moreover, the development of mobile phone application to perform color-based identification of nitrogen content in rice and corn plant is another interesting idea. The usage of such applications promotes the portable and on-site analysis of fertilizer requirements in crop fields [ 64].
